## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as alicloud from "@pulumi/alicloud";

const vpcsDs = pulumi.output(alicloud.vpc.getNetworks({
    cidrBlock: "172.16.0.0/12",
    nameRegex: "^foo",
    status: "Available",
}, { async: true }));

export const firstVpcId = vpcsDs.vpcs[0].id;
```

## Supporting Types


<h4 id="getnetworksvpc">Get<wbr>Networks<wbr>Vpc</h4>

> See the   <a href="/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/alicloud/types/output/#GetNetworksVpc">output</a> API doc for this type.



> See the   <a href="https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/sdk/v2/go/alicloud/vpc?tab=doc#GetNetworksVpc">output</a> API doc for this type.






<dl class="resources-properties">

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Cidr<wbr>Block</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/builtin-types/built-in-types">string</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Filter results by a specific CIDR block. For example: "172.16.0.0/12".
</dd>

    <dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span>Creation<wbr>Time</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

</dd>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">List[str]</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>List of VSwitch IDs in the specified VPC
</dd>

</dl>
